name: Spring Dye
flavorText: Bright green garb is traditionally worn during the Hearth Festival in Bramwell to celebrate the first thaw of springtime.
flavorTextHtml: Bright green garb is traditionally worn during the Hearth Festival in Bramwell to celebrate the first thaw of springtime.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
